entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
